DOC.brief_summary: The trial is performed to assess efficacy and safety of a purified standardised wasp venom preparation in wasp venom allergy
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of a Purified Standardised Wasp Venom Preparation
DOC.criteria: History of wasp venom allergy, Positive RAST to wasp venom, Positive skin prick test to wasp venom Serious chronic diseases
